Detailed Description

CamBot Implementation of the CamBot AI; an AI that moves the camera along a given path.

void CamBot::AddControlPoint ( float  x1,
float  y1,
float  z1,
float  x2,
float  y2,
float  z2 
)

AddControlPoint adds a position vector and look-at vector to the list of points to visit. There must be at least 4 control points as interpolation is between the middle two - the first/last one used to calculate the tangent vector. If there's no look-at point provided, the last one is reused.

void CamBot::SetPosition ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [protected]

SetPosition figures out which control point to use

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
